Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Reset]: Resets and saves the colors back to the original colors for this asset (and season, if applicable).
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Save]: Saves the colors for this season and asset to an XML file located in a folder at %AppData%\LocalLow\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II \ModsData\Recolor \ColorData\ Triggers a color refresh on all assets of the same type.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[SingleInstan: Change the colors of the current selection only.
Recolor.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION[Matching]: Change the colors of all matching assets with same season and color variation. Single Instance will override this for that instance.
